title: Announcement, Present Tense/Photography, 1988
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, center, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella, waning before photography with his pencil of culture   Design: Edward Fella, waning before photography with his pencil of culture
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper two thirds of sheet: FEBRUARY 12-MARCH 12, 1988/ PRESENT TENSE/*/ /*PHOTOGRAPHY/ PATRICIA SPROTT/ KATHRYN BRACKETT-LUCHS...[lists participating artists]...LOIS WALINSKE/ JUROR: PETER GALASSI, CURATOR, DEPARTMENT OF/ PHOTOGRAPHY, THE MUSEUM OF MODERN ART; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226;  across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; diagonally across: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon to 6 p.m.; across lower right quadrant: Opening Reception: Friday, February 12, 1988 6-8:30 pm/ Opening Reception: Friday, February 12, 1988 6-8:30 pm/ Also in the area: Detroit Artists Market 5-7:30 pm/ + = Thoughts into Action, Notes and Works = +/ February 12 - March 12/ + = Thoughts into Action, Notes and Works = +/ February 12 - March 12/ Michigan Council for the Arts Gallery 4-6:00 pm/ 1987 Grant Recipients/ February 12-March 12/ Michigan Council for the Arts Gallery 4-6:00 pm/ 1987 Grant Recipients/ February 12-March 12
Verso: Imprinted in black across lower left quadrant: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station/ Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station/ With the support of/ the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council for the Arts/ With the support of/ the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council for the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit MI/ Permit No. 2960/ Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit MI/ Permit No. 2960

*The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Across upper half of sheet, text giving exhibition date, title, participating artists, juror.  Across lower left edge, sideways, text giving location and contact information, leaf pattern.  Lower right quadrant, text giving reception and additional information.  Upper right corner and lower half of sheet, center, images of leaves.     
Verso: Across upper two thirds of sheet, grouping of abstract figures with cameras, equipment.  Across lower third of sheet, text, in two blocks, giving sponsor and mailing information.  Lower left quadrant, figures with umbrellas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Present Tense/Photography, 1988. Offset lithograph on cream paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-26
